rows.name: question_session_time
rows.value: How many minutes did you spend facilitating your parent @global.share_medium group over the last week?

value.fullExpression: How many minutes did you spend facilitating your parent @global.share_medium group over the last week?

rows.name: question_participants
rows.value:
**Which of the parents in your group participated?**
*Participation is defined as any parent who posts a comment, question, reply or reaction (such as a thumbs up) within the chat since you shared the first message from the weekly discussion.*
